headline: HIDEN ANALYTICAL ATMOSPHERIC/CHAMBER GAS ANALYSIS SYSTEM
description: Atmospheric/Chamber Gas Analysis System     Hiden Analytical HPR-30/QIC
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Residual Gas Analyzers
specstable:
Manufacturer Hiden Analytical
Model HPR-30/QIC
Description Atmospheric/Chamber Gas Analysis System
Accessories

The HPR-30/QIC is configured for analyis of vacuum systems.
The quartz Inert Capillary (QIC)option is installed.
Capillary probe is not included

Other Information

Process pressure range from 1 mbar to 10-4 mbar.
Stability (less than ±0.5% height variation over 24 h).
MASsoft control via RS232, RS485 or Ethernet LAN.
Pneumatic valve control for automatic operation with manual override and fail-safe isolator in case of power failure or overpressure.
Automated simultaneous data acquisition / analysis with local display alarm panels

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 41.000 in (104.1 cm)
Depth 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Height 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Weight 276 lb (125 kg)
